sections.description: Generate a discount code for a main account holder to distribute to sponsored members. Useful for groups or institutions that purchase a block of memberships for “child” accounts.
sections.changelog:
Please note: This is a custom add-on developed for a specific customer & their stated requirements.

1.0

  1. BUG: Drop-shadow with unchecked setting
  2. BUG: Soften the background coloring for odd rows
  3. BUG: Would sometimes crash if PMPro wasn't installed or activated.
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Refactor hooks & filters to init function
  5. ENHANCEMENT: Add function definitions (docs).
  6. ENHANCEMENT: Refactored to be in better compliance w/WP code styles
  7. ENHANCEMENT: More error checking & recovery
  8. ENHANCEMENT: Support filtered URLs (don't ignore the fact that other plugins exist & may filter when creating URLs for PMPro).
  9. ENHANCEMENT: Allow sponsor to remove access for a sponsored user via the sponsor's account page
  10. ENHANCEMENT: Can check whether a sponsored user has access to protected content or not
  11. ENHANCEMENT: Add proper WordPress enqueue/registration of styles & scripts
  12. ENHANCEMENT: Added loading of styles & scripts (no more inline styles/scripts).
  13. ENHANCEMENT: Add callback to manage sposor actions against sponsored user(s).
  14. ENHANCEMENT: Request confirmation when disabling user(s).
  15. ENHANCEMENT: Add error handling for AJAX request
  16. ENHANCEMENT: Blur out disabled users (opacity = 0.5)
  17. ENHANCEMENT: Update the usage count for the code
  18. ENHANCEMENT: Separate JavaScript into own file & process disabling membership for user in discount code list.
  19. ENHANCEMENT: Formatting for membership access slider (Yes/No)
  20. ENHANCEMENT: Formatting for div based table
